attributes.action: Make the income tax you pay on a second job the same as you pay for your first job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the income tax you pay should be the same if you have a second job because if you have a second job you are trying to give yourself a better lifestyle and should not be penalised for working to better yourself, the chancellor has said he wants to help out working famalies and this would be a step in the right direction.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
